ui.join my game: ¡Súmate a mi partida de El pintor impostor!
ui.all fake artists tooltip: This variant can be introduced to make the Fake-Artist doubt himself, or just for laughs!
ui.play with the all fake-artists variant: All Fake Artists: There's a 10% chance everyone is a Fake-Artist. If this happens your only chance to win is if every player votes for himself.
ui.no fake-artist tooltip: This variant is meant to aid the Fake-Artist, but the real artists might suspect the first person who suggests there's no Fake-Artist, even if he is right!
ui.play with the no-fake-artist variant: No Fake Artist: There's a 10% chance there is NO Fake-Artist. if this happens you can only win if all players vote for no one (raise your finger in the air).
ui.invalid access code: ¡No existe ninguna partida con ese código!
ui.footer: Basado en la app de Spyfall de meteor:
ui.Author: ¿Problemas? ¿Sugerencias? Envíame un mensaje en la BGG:
ui.enter category: Escribe la categoría de tu palabra
ui.let us choose: o elegiremos una palabra al azar.
